data.text:
A day with Steph Curry

Plus:
-An airline pilot joins
-Matt Wolff leaves for LIV
-Scotland trip incoming
-More 

https://t.co/FTqPWlRNpj https://t.co/PlHZf3Zzk1
Buried it. #AintNoHobby https://t.co/quRdYNgYZ5
@VivaLaStool @BarstoolYak @anus @nickturani @kbnoswag @ForePlayPod The boys
Nice to see Scottie & @jtedscott out here having success. https://t.co/ECyZb6ocyD

“That’s one” … an instant classic 

@BarstoolClassic @StephenCurry30 https://t.co/hxIyYxIV6u
Monday. https://t.co/Rgct4d8AvL
RT @barstoolsports: .@StephenCurry30 had @FrankieBorrelli SHOOK @BarstoolClassic https://t.co/FBxhX4XTA2

@jackmurray1135 @StephenCurry30 A few people knew. Mostly kept it quiet. Wanted him to be able to show up, play, and enjoy himself like everyone else. But we may have a few more cameras here than normal
He & his boy signed up like everyone else. He wants to win. https://t.co/H5CGSWL6D1
MVP @StephenCurry30 for bird on 7. #buckets https://t.co/PZXrbg8gvw
@stoolpresidente @BarstoolClassic Just one of many trying to win the @BarstoolClassic this year. Good luck to all. #golf https://t.co/H50KwhVhI9
Guy named Steph out here playing in the @BarstoolClassic. Sending seeds on 4 @StephenCurry30. https://t.co/cvobto9qDX
RT @BarstoolClassic: And we are off at Half Moon Bay (with NBA Champion Steph Curry) https://t.co/qY5RSpXVX0

T6 for our guy today (could’ve been better; back nine looked a bit like a hobby). #AintNoHobby

https://t.co/Mxd8VLHDoC https://t.co/QD9EfLdAUh

@hallylead @GrueterGolf 🙏

https://t.co/qvJG8fKVIW https://t.co/HBMPBmWXG8

RT @RyanLavnerGC: Can confirm @jcorrigangolf report that Matthew Wolff is heading to LIV.

What a wild 3-year run: Won on Tour in his 3rd s…
Frustrating! https://t.co/JjNJZu6Jft

Kizzy 2 back. 
2-under thru 6. 
Tied for 2nd. 
(can’t watch rn?) https://t.co/9RRDoEJzor
Tough not to root for @Lexi after last year’s U.S. Open. What a roll! #KPMGWomensPGA https://t.co/AJL6mMuwCx
Call the authorities those biceps in action are a public threat!! https://t.co/9sejXYDor9
RT @ukgolfguy: The fruity language doesn’t offend me but Li didn’t make any effort to shake hands with Pieters after winning which is a bit…
Every time I make a par.  https://t.co/3qnpEe4XPE
@samparry Woah!
@GrayhawkGolf @OwensMixers @barstoolsports @TitosVodka Yes. An excellent idea.

A lot of chatter about “growing the game” lately. Gotta applaud this crew throwing it down in the Slime Cup for the @Nickelodeon crowd tonight. Was a huge slime fan growing up. Still am tbh. 8pET.  https://t.co/1HlhNYcYny
GIVEAWAY SZN  https://t.co/3LCN43LKZf
Another reason to avoid Florida. https://t.co/WQmtwYcb51
However many putts I make in today’s Daily Nine, that’s how many @TaylorMadeGolf Spider GT’s we’re giving away. https://t.co/jAdnDWzeir
@B_Krol @TaylorMadeGolf We’re giving away whatever GT is perfect for each winner.

Giving away several TaylorMade Spider GT’s today. It’s a beautiful summer Friday. Why not. 🕷 

Make sure you follow @TaylorMadeGolf & pay attention to enter to win. https://t.co/nHqKEZnL9w

Checking in on my man @BarstoolTrent’s assault on the number 90. I get no spoilers; wanna live & die on every shot. We got this. Yes I’m still working on the cords issue. #Breaking90

https://t.co/pDE0gDW0As https://t.co/FQX1YQ3q0d
Eagle on his 15th hole of the day gets our guy Alistair back to 1-under for the tourney, currently T45 and inside the cut line 🙏 https://t.co/cF4hed8yus https://t.co/lXzQ4f2SYp

RT @ForePlayPod: Pre-round poops are a necessity 

https://t.co/wRhUDCTFmP https://t.co/ap1oP4lCTB
Difficult golf hole.  https://t.co/0hOqAV04K2
@MattFitz94 You're welcome.

data.text:
Cross-handed wedge from 40 yards on 17 on Saturday at the #USOpen? This guy @MattFitz94 is a madman.

Today’s show —> https://t.co/FTqPWm9WDr https://t.co/KbIHQvrAxj

Today’s pod — #USOpen champ @MattFitz94 in studio 

Plus:
-Brooks to LIV
-Tour changing events
-Faldo out; Immelman in
-Morikawa vs cereal 

Listen: https://t.co/FTqPWm9oNT https://t.co/q5E9uMnqr2
What an answer from Coop. Guy bleeds NHL hockey. Can tell how deeply he feels both the glory and the heartbreak of his team, his players. No wonder teams win for him. https://t.co/cj6MyPSM3C
Buckets.  https://t.co/KwvjsiYhWS

If you’re in Maine this week/weekend go root on our guy Alistair Docherty at the KFT event. He’ll be decked out in Barstool Golf gear from now until the end of time, if we have it our way. #BarstoolGolfer https://t.co/HbukjNYaO1
@CarlPaulsonGolf New tee is a draining project?

RT @dylan_dethier: PGA Tour's proposed Super Schedule:

JAN: Sentry TOC ($15 mil purse)
FEB: Genesis ($20m)
MARCH: Bay Hill ($20m), Players…
This is awesome. https://t.co/ztFveUzWEP
@kelso2002 You'll still be able to make a run. You'll just have to do it with two phenomenal shots instead of 3-wood, mid or short-iron

Looks like 13 finally getting a makeover. New tee and this. Love how Augusta doesn't say a word, makes massive changes, then pops up day before the Masters and is like "oh, 13? ahhh that's right yes there was a slight tweak there" https://t.co/ln0giLMaXY
Congrats @PGATOUR apparently finding hidden treasure.
Hard putt.  https://t.co/UMYYNGlHZQ
RT @usopengolf: The boys. https://t.co/U0YttFBXQX

RT @usopengolf: “It doesn’t matter what happens, I’m a major champion and that’s why it means so much.” – @MattFitz94 on @ForePlayPod 

@Ba…
RT @FrankieBorrelli: Congrats champ @MattFitz94 https://t.co/6AqQo1Sn2Z
RT @collin_morikawa: To state for the record, once again, you all are absolutely wrong. I’ve said it since February at Riviera that I’m her…

New #AintNoHobby head covers.
Restocked #AintNoHobby head covers.
Just great stuff. Really great.

https://t.co/qvJG8g2x7w https://t.co/05SM62cwNx
yep definitely https://t.co/OjQYm9pYOC
@BarstoolTrent Can’t drive a car lookin in the rear view mirror can ya
Faldo out. Immelman in. Trevor is such a good dude and him sitting next to Nantz calling golf, calling the Masters, for the next however many years is phenomenal. Good news! https://t.co/EtK2HDXx0y
RT @JohnMiddlekauff: https://t.co/jStSmM1Qhr
Only surprising thing about this is Brooks didn’t jump sooner. https://t.co/RCX9fxaRV9
Cross-handed chipping ain’t no joke  https://t.co/qlarw94fdD
Barstool Golf women’s line, brought to you for this reason: https://t.co/pUZFJJ0VNz

Women’s golf line 🚨 

Deeply anticipated. Years in the making (worked with actual, real life women to learn what women hopefully like; I obviously don’t know). Now live. 

https://t.co/imGICaznDp https://t.co/9MIkbFW29H
@wingoz Thank you
Do you think humans will walk on Mars in your lifetime?

What an Open. What a week. Full knee-jerk recap pod is live. 

https://t.co/FTqPWm9oNT https://t.co/25QHqG366y
RT @Daniel_Rapaport: Will Zalatoris is such a class act. After he missed the putt for a playoff, he went up to Matt Fitzpatrick’s parents a…

#USOpen recap pod. Now live. Our pal @MattFitz94 wins.

https://t.co/FTqPWm9oNT https://t.co/xsxIvy6LOS
@HondoDiaz20 Up now
@HondoDiaz20 Yes it’s coming
RT @MattFitz94: https://t.co/KpEpEwRWhs

RT @PGATOUR: Family memories at Brookline 🏆

2013 U.S. Amateur Champion
2022 U.S. Open Champion https://t.co/IgWFgLEtP6

RT @MereGorman: Matt Fitzpatrick on winning @usopengolf:

"The feeling is out of this world. It's so clichè, but it's stuff you dream about…
Awesome. Class.  https://t.co/QybsG4Ju5J
RT @Daniel_Rapaport: I’m about to be dddddeeeeeeerrrrrruuuunnnnnnnnnkkkkkkk

So cool for Fitz. A true grinder. Took it HARD when he struggled at the Ryder Cup. Took it HARD when he struggled on Sunday at Southern Hills. Used it all as motivation. Wins the freaking U.S. Open at TCC. Awesome.
Golf shot from Fitz. Golf. Shot. What an answer from Willy Z. Getting himself a read. This tournament is so good. SO GOOD! #USOpen #golf
Oh my god. #golf
Willy Z fuck yes.
RT @RiggsBarstool: If they didn’t have the goal posts I would have no idea where he’s supposed to hit it. Thank you. https://t.co/9EMKTqIKwU
RT @Sean_Zak: does that constitute a DOINK https://t.co/c6ZhhQzUTX
Fitzy from the parking lot.  https://t.co/hfgpA4giwh

WILLY Z!!! 

This #USOpen is just absolutely phenomenal. What a golf tournament. I’m having a lovely time.
HOLY SHIT FITZY
Holy fuck.
WILLY FUCKING Z https://t.co/DnpfWFqYCj
Da putting god  https://t.co/LFcnCGhipT

RT @ForePlayPod: WILLY Z WALKS IT IN! 1 STROKE BACK OF THE LEADERS! 

Riggsy got him pre tournament +2800 on @BSSportsbook https://t.co/cV1…
Zinger: Ok he’s never missed this putt ever not in his life once. Let’s see how he does.
Alright this putt’s uphill kinda downhill uphill downhill one here
Willy fucking Z walking ‘em in?!? What?!?! https://t.co/J6vMANZK1L
RT @JustinRayGolf: Hogan wore braces on this legs after the accident
Willy Z!!!! https://t.co/Q2nlJke1fU
@BarstoolLurch Happy Father’s Day, Lurchy
Broadcast can’t spoil Scottie’s championship leading birdie putt. Just can’t happen. Unacceptable.
Willy Z making my putting stroke look like Rickie Fowler
Scottie. That was sick. Would have for sure bladed that over the green made double then bitched all day about how unlucky I got.
1-under thru 1. https://t.co/bTBeVdoSkO
Totally fair. https://t.co/057o4rDQmv
Sweet camera shot here. Let’s have a Sunday.  https://t.co/1zr5gk40i2

Putter, down.
Wedge, down.
Folks we’re just one club away from golf’s version of the Gordie Howe hat trick. We can do this. https://t.co/skrKpXmUtr

"Keep an eye on Grayson Murray here" the telecast just said. Amen. Should be included in the safety bulletins provided to fans: 

- Watch for flying golf balls
- Listen for "fore" calls
- Keep an eye on Grayson Murray

What a wild 3-year run: Won on Tour in his 3rd start as a pro; top-4s in two 2020 majors and rose to No. 12 in the world; now has slumped to 74th. Still just 23 years old.

PGA Tour's proposed Super Schedule:

JAN: Sentry TOC ($15 mil purse)
FEB: Genesis ($20m)
MARCH: Bay Hill ($20m), Players ($25m), Match Play ($20m)
APRIL: Masters
MAY: PGA
JUNE: Memorial ($20m), US Open
JULY: Open Champ
AUG: Playoffs ($20m each)

Fall: Int'l Series
With the course closed, I’ve just sat in the middle of the 18th fairway with my four week old son three weeks before @TheOpen. Only in St.Andrews 💙 https://t.co/ab746eoN1I
@RiggsBarstool 13 was perfect. If your guy was down he still had 13 to start his run. Wish they would have left it alone.
Big changes coming to #13 at Augusta National 👀 https://t.co/6ncjk0oDq4
The boys. https://t.co/U0YttFBXQX

To state for the record, once again, you all are absolutely wrong. I’ve said it since February at Riviera that I’m here to stay on the @PGATOUR and nothing has changed. Now if you’ll excuse me, I’ve got some cereal to pour in my milk
